document_data.name: Wheber Ott
document_data.mainbody: '''Wheber Ott''' was a [[necromancer]] that hailed from the [[Sword Coast]] region of [[Faerûn]] for a time during the mid–14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Possesions: He wore a ''[[robe of cold resistnace]]'', and was armed with a ''+1 [[item enchantment|enchanted]]'' [[dagger]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, Wheber joined the [[Zhentarim]] mage[[Niemain]], along with two other spellcasters, [[Willaim Garst]] and [[Oulam]], to cast an especiallyparticularly difficult spell on the second flor of the [[Sorcerous Sundries]] in [[Baldur's Gate]].
